DOC.brief_title: Evaluation 3 Intraocular Lenses Following Lens Extraction
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clinically document diagnosis agerelated bilateral cataract consider amenable treatment standard phacoemulsification cataract extraction . Subjects must require spherical lens power 10.00 D 33.00 D Subjects must potential corrected distance visual acuity ( CDVA ) 20/32 good eye , document Potential Acuity Meter Subjects condition increase risk zonular rupture , pseudoexfoliation syndrome . Zonular rupture cataract surgery may affect postoperative centration , tilt , stability lens . Subjects active inflammation edema ( swell ) cornea , include limited following : keratitis , keratoconjunctivitis , keratouveitis . Subjects visually significant diabetic retinopathy ( proliferative nonproliferative ) reduce potential acuity 20/32 worse .
